all.description: Select all values in the combo box (combo must be of type multiple).
all.example: select from combo box {{$ --all}} on {select_menu} by {id}

description: Provides a convenience method for manipulating selections of options in an HTML select element. This action supports different selection options as well as multiple selection based on a pattern.

examples.description: Selects a single value from select_menu combo box, by item text.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {Two} on {select_menu} using {id}

examples.description: Selects a single value from select_menu combo box, by item value.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {2} on {select_menu} using {id} from {value}

examples.description: Selects a single value from select_menu combo box, by item index.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {2} on {select_menu} using {id} from {index}

examples.description: Selects multiple values from select_menu_multiple combo box, by item text.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {["One", "Two"]} on {select_menu_multiple} using {id}

examples.description: Selects multiple values from select_menu_multiple combo box, by item value.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {["1", "2"]} on {select_menu_multiple} using {id} from {value}

examples.description: Selects multiple values from select_menu_multiple combo box, by item index.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {["1", "2"]} on {select_menu_multiple} using {id} from {index}

examples.description: Selects all values from select_menu_multiple combo box.
examples.literalExample: select from combo box {{$ --all}} on {select_menu_multiple} using {id}

name: SelectFromComboBox

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.onAttribute: The element attribute from which to extract information for action execution. If not specified, information will be taken from the element inner text.
properties.regularExpression: A pattern by which the extracted information will be evaluated. Returns the first match.
properties.argument: The value to be used by the requested selecting attribute.

summary: Provides a convenience method for manipulating selections of options in an HTML <select> element.
